site_specie_symbol.description: The chemical symbol of the species at a specific site in the structure.

substitution_symmetry_equivalence.description: Checks if two substitution sites are symmetry equivalent.

substitution_string_representation.description: String representation of the substitution defect.
substitution_string_representation.value: O subsitituted on the N site at at site #3

substitution_oxidation_state.description: Oxidation state of the substitution defect.

substitution_charge_states.description: Possible charge states for the substitution defect.

substitution_multiplicity.description: Multiplicity of the substitution defect in the structure.

supercell_site_specie_symbol.description: The chemical symbol of the species at the defect site in the supercell structure.

supercell_formula.description: Chemical formula of the supercell structure containing the defect.

substitution_latex_name.description: LaTeX formatted name of the substitution defect.

substitution_element_changes.description: Elemental changes due to the substitution defect.

free_sites_intersection_ratio.description: Ratio of the intersection to the union of free sites in the supercell with locking.

perturbation_free_sites.description: Set of free site indices after perturbation in the supercell structure.

user_defined_charge_states.description: User-defined charge states for the substitution defect.

default_charge_states.description: Default charge states for the substitution defect when no user charges are defined.

target_fractional_coordinates.description: Fractional coordinates of the defect site in the supercell structure.

closest_equivalent_site_coordinates.description: Fractional coordinates of the closest equivalent site after changing target coordinates.

antisite_charge_states.description: Charge states for an antisite substitution defect.
